CANTRIP.DESCRIPTION: Considered a [#5299DC]Spell[] so long as you have fewer than 2 stacks of [#5299DC]Power[].

FEAT.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played as the first [#FF5252]Arte[] of the turn.

SPELLPOWER.DESCRIPTION: Increases the Защиты gained from and урона dealt by [#5299DC]Spells[].

STONESKIN.DESCRIPTION: Gives 2 Защиты at the start of each turn. This Защиты is affected by any Защиты-affecting мощь.

TECHNIQUE.DESCRIPTION: Increases the Защиты gained from and урона dealt by [#FF5252]Artes[].
